name: the-buoy-windy-plugin
description: Windy plugin for The Buoy (labouee.app), showing live wave buoys from Candhis & NOAA NDBC on Windy.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && SERVE=false rollup -c && cp package.json dist/
